Package com.qoretechnologies.qorus.service

Annotation Type QorusMethod

  • @Documented
@Retention(RUNTIME)
@Target(METHOD)
@Inherited
public @interface QorusMethod
    This annotation interface defines annotations for servicemethods "service methods"

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element Description
      java.lang.String desc
      The service method description; this is the only required value for a service method

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
      java.lang.String author
      The service method author, if different than the service author; an empty string means no author tag
      boolean intern
      The value of the methodinternalflag If true it means that the method will not be automatically exported via network interfaces
      QorusMethod.LockType lock
      The value for the methodreadwritelock
      boolean write
      The value of the method "write" flag If this boolean flag is set to true, then the method will be marked as a "write" method, meaning that external callers will have to have the OMQ.QR_CALL_USER_SERVICES_RW "CALL-USER-SERVICES-RW" role to call the method if RBAC "RBAC security" is enabled

    • Element Detail

      • desc

        java.lang.String desc
        The service method description; this is the only required value for a service method

      • author

        java.lang.String author
        The service method author, if different than the service author; an empty string means no author tag
        Default:
        ""

      • lock

        QorusMethod.LockType lock
        The value for the methodreadwritelock
        Default:
        com.qoretechnologies.qorus.service.QorusMethod.LockType.None

      • intern

        boolean intern
        The value of the methodinternalflag If true it means that the method will not be automatically exported via network interfaces
        Default:
        false

      • write

        boolean write
        The value of the method "write" flag If this boolean flag is set to true, then the method will be marked as a "write" method, meaning that external callers will have to have the OMQ.QR_CALL_USER_SERVICES_RW "CALL-USER-SERVICES-RW" role to call the method if RBAC "RBAC security" is enabled
        Default:
        false
